tool_description: Validates ticket resolutions to ensure completeness, customer satisfaction, and quality standards before closing cases.

resolution_description.description: Detailed description of how the issue was resolved

agent_id.description: ID of agent providing the resolution

resolution_type.description: Type of resolution (solved, workaround, duplicate, no_action_needed)

customer_confirmation.description: Whether customer confirmed the resolution works

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Agent not found: The provided agent_id does not exist.
Invalid resolution type: Use one of [solved, workaround, duplicate, no_action_needed].
Empty resolution: Resolution description cannot be empty.
Validation failed: Resolution does not meet quality standards. Provide more detail.
Customer confirmation missing: Customer confirmation is required before closing high-priority tickets.
usage: Validate ticket resolutions before closing to ensure quality and completeness. System checks resolution against standards and customer satisfaction requirements.

ready_to_close.description: Whether ticket is ready for closure
